content: many sock yarns are too beautiful just to be hidden in your shoes in this pattern a wonderful sock yarn is turned into a warming cowl for your neck **pattern available in english and norwegian choose amiga english or amiga norwegian when downloading ** crocheted flower pentagons are joined together and then stitches are picked up for the knitted ribbing i made the original version of this pattern for a friend and i finished it on holiday in spain hence the name amiga means friend in spanish and the cowl warms you like a friend s hug on a cold day
